website_summaries.verdict: This low wooden table is sturdy and comes with a carrying bag to make it easy to take to and use at the beach.
pros: Rolls up to put in a bag you can carry over your shoulder
cons: The table has to be screwed together and re-set every time you use it

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: *****Updated review***** When I received this table I initially rated it as 4 or 5 stars. Well that has changed. I've had it less than 2 months and used it 5 times at outdoor concerts and tailgating. The 6th time I used it one of the slats fell off and I noticed that others are loose. The boards are stapled on there and clearly not very well. I had a C&B table like this previously and it lasted YEARS without any issues. I guess you get what you pay for. Take my advice and spend the extra money!
customer_reviews.author: RAE65

customer_reviews.title: Love this Table!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table a few years back and have used it every time we picnic or go to our local music in the park. It is easy to carry, set up and it is the perfect height for those who are sitting on the ground or using beach chairs. We love this so much we have been gifting it to others. It is the perfect size for dinner for two. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lenoir

customer_reviews.title: Strong and Glossy
customer_reviews.text: I love these little tables. They are great for the park. My last one was a more raw finish and it started to warp. I like this one because it was a gloss finish which will help with cleanliness and it seems it will hold up better. Just note these can be tough to assemble, you always have to really stretch it.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Valenti

customer_reviews.title: Great little camping table
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure this deserves some of the bad reviews as to putting together, just remember the bars should be parallel to the straps, it wont work the other way. wood isn't perfect but this is a camping picnic table and a good value as the next one up is over twice the price. Mine went together easily and is sturdy and perfect in size for inside my tent or out by the fire. Nice dinner table for a picnic with a couple of pillows on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Tree

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: For the price quality could be a little better, if it was cheaper I may not of returned it, seemed to be a little problematic lining up the posts and holes while stetchung the top and was a bit wobbly once completed. If it was 15-20 cheaper I may of stuck with it, instead I returned it
customer_reviews.author: M. Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love the carrying case too
customer_reviews.text: This has changed our beach week forever. Its a little hard to straighten out when you first get it, but it loosens up after a couple of times. Love the carrying case too. Perfect height for food or a glass of wine. Even took it to the beach and played scrabble on it.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Better than I thought it would be
customer_reviews.text: Saw a few of these when I went to the beach last year and liked the idea. Decided to give it a try this year and cannot believe I've lived without it for so long. I love this table. Makes it so easy to put a spread out and serve family and friends. It breaks down easy and stows in the included bag.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rose

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great design! But its not really well made so we'll see how long it lasts. It arrived with one of the slats split down the middle and the screw holes don't easily line up so it takes a while to get the four legs in. But, for $49, its well worth the value
customer_reviews.author: Denali96

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase - completely useless
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 0 out of 5 stars if I could. Whoever assembled this needs to be fired. One of the end panels was installed UPSIDE DOWN so you CANT SCREW HALF THE LEGS IN on the right side, making it completely useless!!!!! I never got to use this table, and there is no “exchange” option to get the problem fixed... in sum, do not purchase this table. Seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Lenny V

customer_reviews.title: Lasted one use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table to take on camp trips and to the beach for picnics. Sadly, we did not get to use it for either! I assembled it in the backyard for a trial run, then about one week later, went back to disassemble it to pack it up for the beach. Two of the wood legs became completely threaded from the screws while unscrewing them. The table is completely useless now, so we spent $87 on a table that we never got to use, and now its too late to return the item. Do not purchase this table, it is very poorly constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Good Portable Board Game Table
customer_reviews.text: Good portable table for use with board games and other picnic type activities. Easy to assemble and just as quickly disassemble. Well made. Wood has normal defects/blemishes. Will need to take care to not place too heavy of items on it or lean on it.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Yep...great little beach/camping table
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice beach or camping table that fills up nicely for storage and travel. Unique design and very versatile. My neighbor had 2 and I had to get one. So happy I did. We’ve used it a lot and no doubt it will be a beach and travel staple for a very long time!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Keil

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new table! Once I figured out how to put it together, it was super easy. I can’t wait to use this on picnics, concerts in the park, and camping. Lots of great uses for a low table that is easy to stow away and transport.
customer_reviews.author: Ingrid

customer_reviews.title: Need Strength to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Quite sturdy once you put it together but assembling it takes some strength and coordination because you need to stretch out the stapled black straps to its max extension before you can install in the legs. It takes strength to max stretch it
customer_reviews.author: Ami L

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: EXACTLY what I was looking for, table bag is a heavy canvas with shoulder strap, table is super easy to put together and everything lined up for me (meaning table leg holes for assembling).
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Grammer

customer_reviews.title: But it is super convenient; we love bringing it to the park ...
customer_reviews.text: It looks a lot more orangey in real life. But it is super convenient; we love bringing it to the park for picnics to eat on and to play games on
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for outdoor concerts!
customer_reviews.text: Great for taking along to Ravinia (outdoor music festival in Chicagoland) or to the beach! Super portable, easy to assemble sturdy without being to heavy to lug around. Actually thinking of getting a second one!
customer_reviews.author: Kym

customer_reviews.title: PURE TRASH - DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: The legs screw into a piece of the top of the table, that strips out after hardly any time or use, the table is worthless! Poor quality, DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: NC

customer_reviews.title: returned
customer_reviews.text: Had to return this table. It would have been perfect, especially for the price, but came with the wood warped at the end, so it was no longer flat.
customer_reviews.author: Nik_ee_gee

customer_reviews.title: Great Design, Sturdy and So Useful
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my niece after she expressed interest in the table in a bag that I got years ago from Crate and Barrel. It's nice & sturdy, well made and less expensive. Love playing scrabble on it at the beach or on the floor in the living room. It's that versatile and easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anicab

customer_reviews.title: Love these. Hard to assemble. Takes practice.
customer_reviews.text: I really like these. If they could figure out how to make it less stressful to assemble, I would love them. We decided to just leave it assembled.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brazile

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: This item is great! I receive many compliments when I take it somewhere. Easy to assemble and set up. Love the carry bag that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This table is the perfect size to carry and set up for a quick picnic or outdoor concert. It's just high enough to keep your food and drinks off the ground. It's also easy to clean and pack back up for the trek home.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great for tailgating!
customer_reviews.text: The best little table for tailgating! It rolls up and stores as a small package and is just the perfect height for sitting in folding chairs and having some place to sit you food and beverage. This is my second one I wore the first one out.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a picnic! Perfect for the beach! Perfect for the park. It’s half the cost of what crate and barrel charges.
customer_reviews.author: Lana S

customer_reviews.title: this was one of the best additions to our camping gear most difficult thing is ...
customer_reviews.text: we camp a lot and try to enhance our campsite with something every year, this was one of the best additions to our camping gear most difficult thing is stopping people from wanting to sit on it because it looks more stable
customer_reviews.author: SMOPizza

customer_reviews.title: Perfect table for concerts in the park or a table ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect table for concerts in the park or a table for two for a park lunch. Too high for low sitting chairs to use as a dining table but perfect to set appetizers on. Packs up nicely, sets up fairly easily. Takes a little manipulation to get the last leg into the hole to screw it in. Easiest to do three legs first then the fourth on its own as opposed to two people trying to do one side at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous design and function!
customer_reviews.text: We use this table all the time for picnics at the beach and park. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: RickinCBAD

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be put together for the first time.
customer_reviews.text: Not good quality. Legs were bent and we couldn’t line up the screws to get all four in. Couldn’t imagine trying to put together at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: A great thing to have for the regular picnicker
customer_reviews.text: We love this table. We have two little ones and they are notorious for putting a foot in your food during a picnic. This table resolves that and is easy to put together and take apart. Light weight too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Cullis

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table to use on picnics and at outdoor concerts. We have used it a couple times and overall it is great. Assembly is easy. The storage bag is very convenient. The only reason I didn’t give it five stars is because it is a little wobbly.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon V

customer_reviews.title: Great beach table
customer_reviews.text: One of my best Amazon purchases. Love having a sturdy table at the beach and it’s so easy to set up. Got many compliments on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Michele McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking table
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our old ravinia table with this one and got lots of compliments. Seems like it will hold up
customer_reviews.author: MobileReader

customer_reviews.title: SAVE YOURSELF THE AGGRAVATION...DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.text: I am beyond pissed. I received the table yesterday and tried to put it up today for use this afternoon. The slats used to stabilize the table are unable to be screwed in...the drilled holes do not match the actual holes on the table even after I stretched the table. This makes absolutely no sense and is a testament to someone seriously "not caring"! Going to Crate & Barrel to buy...
customer_reviews.author: MBA SHOPPER

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Great table. We take our to the beach and it’s perfect in between our chairs !!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: great buy - perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: so easy to carry and assemble and disassemble at the beach!
customer_reviews.author: jb

customer_reviews.title: Color options would be great
customer_reviews.text: The only reason i gave it 3 stars is because of the size for the price. Trying to assemble after reading reviews i knew it would be fairly difficult but it never fully assembled due to one of the holes not being lined up correctly. As well as the color is not the nice wood shown its orange. Bright orange. Assuming it is from whatever they coated the wood with
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Kilian

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Lighter in color than expected. More yellow than redwood/teak but works great & easy to put together & travel with.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Varble

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my boat and is convenient to store and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Knickolas knickelby

customer_reviews.title: This product it's great! It's perfect to go to the beach or ...
customer_reviews.text: This product it's great! It's perfect to go to the beach or the park. Has a great size and it's very easy to take everywhere. The only thing it's that is a little difficult to assemble, especially to fit the legs in the base of the table.
customer_reviews.author: Constanza Eglinton

customer_reviews.title: great little table for my rooftop party
customer_reviews.text: This was a lot more red tone than expected. Setup is easier with too people but overall very simple to setup. I also love the bag for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size!
customer_reviews.text: Love the picnic table. Just what I was looking for. It took two people to stretch the chords the first time but left the table all set up for one whole day and the next time we used it it was no problem in setting it up. We love it and can’t wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer events
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for outdoor music in the park or a picnic. It rolls tight and is easy to carry!
customer_reviews.author: ALBA G

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but very difficult to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to assemble. I should have returned it as the pieces just don’t fit. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Poulton

customer_reviews.title: the stability bars are not drilled to same spec as ...
customer_reviews.text: the stability bars are not drilled to same spec as table. Not functional - will be returning. I've read review of similar complaints - and I don't have the time to modify a product to make it work. It should come that way and tested prior to shipping
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: This was completely perfect for camping as a side table and for a ...
customer_reviews.text: This was completely perfect for camping as a side table and for a picnic in the park. We love it and it collapses into a small bag which is perfect for lugging around NYC for the Philharmonic in the park. It was nice not having to keep the food on the ground and was perfect for people sitting in chairs or on the ground. Also nice looking to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Chiaro

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and not easily put together. (Timewise)
customer_reviews.text: It’s very heavy. It’s not easily put together for a quick beach run. 6 pieces to put together for it to be complete. I should have gotten the collapsible one.
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Could be better in the design and quality
customer_reviews.text: Kinda hard to setup, and fairly heavy. You have to stretch the table out then fit it though a hole in the support arm and try to align that with a flush internal washer🙄
customer_reviews.author: megggy chan

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.  Pieces are cut wrong so cannot be put together.
customer_reviews.text: Table is completely unusable since one of the parts which holds it together is much too long. We didn’t figure it out until we were on the beach and tried to put it together. What a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Pam VanBuskirk

customer_reviews.title: Best portable table out there
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. So easy to transport and assemble. Great for all outdoor uses
customer_reviews.author: evan hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Nice but Not so Portable
customer_reviews.text: Well let me say the table is well made and fits in the carry bag. But Its kinda hard to put together and I wanted something more convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Defulgentis

customer_reviews.title: Great table for on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Love this table and always getting compliments on it. I take it to the beach, concerts, etc. easy to assemble and take down and put back in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and easy to break down, super lightweight.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the park, beach or camping. Easy to set up and easy to break down, super lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Dianna Kim

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Hard to fix and non adjustable! Had to fix it but stilll its not functional as most of the outdoor camping gears should be !
customer_reviews.author: Talar taslakian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Great table for picnics. Easy assemble and compact to carry around. Also looks quite nice. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Paraiso

customer_reviews.title: Great beach table
customer_reviews.text: We love this compact table which we use when we are vacationing at the beach. Sturdy and easy to assemble. Year 1 complete - we'll see how this stands up over time.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, bad manufacturing job.
customer_reviews.text: This product would be amazing except the fact that the holes do not line up with the wood bar needed to assemble the table. Without it the table is useless. Great idea, bad manufacturing job.
customer_reviews.author: Aylin Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Support slats wider than the table; insertion holes do not line up
customer_reviews.text: I could not return this fast enough. A friend of mine had one made by Crate and Barrel years ago, and when I saw this I was so excited! But you can't even put it together.
customer_reviews.author: alexandra christy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Good quality. Get's lots of attention from people who see it "Where did you get that?"
customer_reviews.author: Karen Roth

customer_reviews.title: Good size and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Works well and we use it for the beach. No rusting and good size and overall product.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin and Lisa Larson

customer_reviews.title: But we really wanted one for the summer picnics so we fixed it ourselves - now we love it.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a number of these from different vendors. Unfortunately they all came defective (not the vendors fault). But we really wanted one for the summer picnics so we fixed it ourselves - now we love it.
customer_reviews.author: TTV

customer_reviews.title: Versatile table
customer_reviews.text: I love this little table! It is made very well, strong and easy to assemble. It can be use it indoors and outdoors. Great for picnics or table for patio .
customer_reviews.author: Monica A. Medina

customer_reviews.title: but it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: It was much heavier than I expected, but it's sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Perfect for picnics and bands in the parks!
customer_reviews.author: Cha Cha P

customer_reviews.title: Great for the park, setting on the lawn.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, easy to assemble. Great for a picnic on the park lawn.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny J

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice product could you order longer legs with this item.
customer_reviews.author: r2ume

customer_reviews.title: Nice packable table
customer_reviews.text: Great for picnics. Easy carry bag doesn’t take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: KoryK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Beach table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Perfect size when put away and can hold lots of day trip snacks
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Baker

customer_reviews.title: Not able to assemble properly, holes don’t line up
customer_reviews.text: The whole son the legs don’t line up so I was not able to put it together. Frustrating!
customer_reviews.author: Hilary T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great well made and sturdy table !
customer_reviews.author: Bebe

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: this table is the perfect height and easy to put up. Fits well between two or four beach chairs as a game table or side table.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the summer picnic on the beach
customer_reviews.text: Nice addition to the summer picnic on the beach! No hassle to put it together and doesn't need extra space for storage. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Great beach table
customer_reviews.text: A great table for the beach!! Very well made and easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: J Paradise

customer_reviews.title: The color of the table is different than the pictures
customer_reviews.text: Just an FYI the tables we received were more of a golden/reddish hue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and easy to assemble. Great quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C Hayes

customer_reviews.title: cute, but Not the best
customer_reviews.text: after one use it fell apart. screws fell apart from the legs. i was disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Jesse E Schwartzman

customer_reviews.title: Missing legs
customer_reviews.text: Table came with nice bag and seems like it would be a good product, however, it arrived MISSING 2 legs and can't be used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great small travels light easy to put together great for our weekend concerts
customer_reviews.author: guy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our portable table!
customer_reviews.text: We take this table to outdoor plays and concerts. the table is very sturdy and looks nice. Love that is comes with a carrying case!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Picnic table
customer_reviews.text: Very nice picnic table for the park! We've only used it once so far but it was very easy to assemble and take apart.
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee Durr

customer_reviews.title: Great table for a great price, can require some elbow grease to set up.
customer_reviews.text: I used this table for picnics all summer long and it looks just like the one sold at Crate & Barrel, but for much less $$$. We got so many compliments on this and it's the perfect size. My only problem with it is it's very difficult to stretch the top of the table to fit the last leg. I've definitely scratched all around the screw hole trying to get the leg in. I get why it's that way but just a smidge more give would make life SO much easier and I don't think would effect the stability of the table. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Any Bruni

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome so portable perfect for the beach
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome so portable perfect for the beach. Sets up quickly easily disassemble just the same
customer_reviews.author: Lbd

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Returned this product. Must assemble each time used. Was looking for something that pops up or folds/unfolds.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: Best Choice Products 28x28in Foldable Indoor Outdoor All-Purpose Portable Wooden Table for Picnics, Camping, Beach, Tailgating, Patio, Kitchen, Living Room w/Carrying Case - Brown
product_meta.description:
Bring convenience to any activity with this compact and foldable table! At a picnic or on the beach, this simple table can be quickly set up to hold drinks and snacks while you relax. It easily folds up to go in the carrying case so that it can be taken anywhere! 

Specifications: 
Table Dimensions: 27.5"(L) x 27.5"(W) x 16.5"(H) 
Table Thickness: 0.5” 
Carrying Bag: 32.5”(L) x 10”(W) 
Weight Capacity: 88 lbs. 
Weight: 7.3 lbs. 
Material: Wood 
Minimal assembly required (with instructions) 

Package Includes: 
Table 
Carrying case
feature_bullets: PORTABLE DESIGN: This unique table is designed to roll up and fit inside the included carrying case for easy storage and transportation; 16.5-inch height also means there's no need for chairs
TAKE IT TO THE BEACH: Compact and lightweight, this versatile table is ideal for active outdoor use at the beach, camping, or tailgating; even for indoor use in the kitchen, living room, and more
WATER-RESISTANT HARDWOOD: Crafted with durable wood slats to withstand plenty of use in- or outside; ideal for holding food and snacks, grilling supplies, or even board games
RUBBER FEET: Designed with 4 sturdy legs that have non-slip rubber feet to prevent sliding and keep the table sturdy on a different surfaces from cement to carpet

EASY ASSEMBLY: Put it together in as little as 10 minutes with 3 simple steps: insert bolts into each corner, attach the cross beams, screw on the legs, and you're good to go!; TABLE DIMENSIONS: 27.5"(L) x 27.5"(W) x 16.5"(H); Weight Capacity: 88 lbs.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars215 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
